original_text:
how much more those who live in houses of clay,
    whose foundations are in the dust,
    who are crushed more readily than a moth!
korean_text: 하물며 흙 집에 살며 티끌로 터를 삼고 하루살이 앞에서라도 무너질 자이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: how much more those who live in houses of clay
sentences.korean_translation: 진흙 집에 사는 자들이야말로 얼마나 더한가

sentences.original_text: whose foundations are in the dust
who are crushed more readily than a moth
